title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the MarketMLSuite project, including features, functionalities, security considerations, and data privacy needs.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the MarketMLSuite, including components, interactions, and data flow.

title: Develop Security and Privacy Strategies
description: Develop strategies and mechanisms to ensure data privacy, intellectual property protection, and overall system security.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Design the user interface and user experience for both buyers and sellers, considering usability and accessibility.

title: Plan Infrastructure and Deployment
description: Plan and design the infrastructure and deployment strategies for the private cloud environment, considering scalability, availability, security, monitoring, and maintenance.
